resources.string: As the name itself suggests, our cafe is a perfect location to have a nice time with delicious Pastries and Coffee.\nOur restaurant is an apt food place-cum-a Coffee shop which also offers a wide variety of Sandwiches, Pizzas, Rolls, Beverages.
Shop No. 21, Dutt Island, Siripuram Junction, Near HSBC, Siripuram, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, 530003.
